title: Motivation for OR operator
course: Discrete Mathematics by Prof Sudarshan Iyengar

transcript.text: Let us start with a very famous quote.

He who knows and knows that he knows is an intellectual, he's a leader, follow him.

knows not which means he's unaware that he is not knowledgeable.
